metadata.name: Myrai Crystal
metadata.description: The Myrai Crystal is the foundation of Myrai's marketplace and network. Owning a Myrai Crystal signifies that you are among the exclusive and elite Myrai holders. The Myrai Crystal acts as a WL to future Myrai collections, gives you access to FREE manga, a lifetime subscription the Myrai Creations' Anime Hub, additional benefits within Myrai's ecosystem, and your first steps into a decentralized Anime Industry worth $26.89 Billion.
